page.title: 12St.Mary's Church,Lydden
page.content: Lydden church is part of a united benefice with Temple Ewell.It operates independently with its own Parochial Church Council and runs its own church and events.There is some co-operation with Temple Ewell and people from Temple Ewell help by conducting worship.The congregation is particularly faithful and loyal.From an Electoral Roll of 17 we have a congregation of about 14.They look after the church building exceptionally well.Christmas,Easter,Patronal Festival and Harvest are marked with an extra service in the afternoon or evening in addition to our normal Communion Service in the morning.We run a Harvest Supper supported by the villagers.We have a Cheese and Wine Party,Bring and Buy and Christmas Bazaar each year. During Lent we have a small group following the Radio Kent Lent course.
